text:
Footer and Header are implemented by XSSFOddFooter, XSSFEvenFooter,
XSSFFirstFooter ecc...
The default footer and header are the odd ones: (XSSFSheet.getFooter() and
XSSFSheet.getOddFooter() are the same)

Created attachment 21455
Patch with tests and implementations for the listed methods
creator: paolo.moz@gmail.com
